metadata.dc:author: Pascual, L F
Iñíguez, C
Jericó, I
Morales, F
Cuesta, J
metadata.dc:description: We report on an immunocompetent patient who developed acquired toxoplasmosis and Miller-Fisher syndrome with central and peripheral neural involvement. We suggest the possible relationship between acquired toxoplasmosis and Miller-Fisher syndrome, even though we cannot exclude a mere coincidence. To our knowledge such an association has not been reported.
metadata.dc:title: Síndrome de Miller-Fisher asociado a infección por toxoplasma.
[Miller-Fisher syndrome associated with toxoplasmosis].
